Type.BattleDialog: Keep your eyes closed. Save yourselves from unnecessary distraction.
Hold your position. We shall be ready for oncoming attacks.
We act as proxies of the will of the Prescripts.
…Perhaps it’s time I met a new Messenger.
The Prescripts never fail to guide us along the right path.
I cannot refute this outcome. It never told us to emerge victorious…
Those who wish to live a life through meaning given by a higher power, should be prepared to accept death as one such meaning.
Now is the time to act and carry out the Prescript.
Even the highest peaks reaching to the skies can break.
Remember. Negligent behavior will lead to death.
The remaining ones will continue to carry out the Prescript.
No excuses.
You were fated to fall at this moment.
…The deed is nearly done.
Only the Prescripts know who will live or die here.
…Keep them down.
I cannot fathom how adept they might be.
They were not fit to hold a candle to us.
…Another Prescript will be waiting for us outside.
…I have no complaint against the set course.
Who could have quarrel with the fate set by the Prescripts.
This must have been destined to happen.
I cannot be led astray by what happened before my eyes.
There is no way to change the predetermined path.
We are to complete our duty.
Laughable. Is this what your will had to show?
Finished you with one cut…
…This is rather demanding.
What a bad boy Yan is~ He can’t just send us here and go somewhere else all alone!
Another day of carrying out Prescripts~
The Prescripts always bring us to the right places~
That wasn’t hard to complete~
Was taking these books part of the Prescript~?
How sad~ But what can I do…
A pity that you had to perish that way~
The rest of us gotta finish the Prescript somehow, right~?
Hmm, could this be a trial~?
I wonder when my demise will be~
It won’t take us to the wrong way still~
You’re just like the liger that greeted us at the door~ Half-baked like the halves you are.
No hard feelings~ It’s all in the will of the Prescripts.
We’ve almost completed this Prescript~
